refnamediv.refpurpose: Enables or disables all Jack ports.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Plugin opcode in jacko. This opcode is part of the plugin repository and has to be installed separately. The plugin repository can be found here: https://github.com/csound/plugins
In the orchestra header, after all Jack connections have been created, enables or disables all Jack input and output opcodes inside this instance of Csound to read or write data.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: iactive -- A flag that turns the ports on (the default) or off.
